name: Partner Manager
author: Erik Saulnier

sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/partner-manager directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Custom post type for Partners
  • Partner carousel widget
  • Partner list shortcode
sections.description: Allows site administrators to manage the site’s partners and display them in the form of a image slider or a list (using a shortcode).
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/partner-manager directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress

short_description: Allows site administrators to manage the site's partners and display them in the form of a image slider or a list (using a shortcode).
description: Allows site administrators to manage the site’s partners and display them in the form of a image slider or a list (using a shortcode).
